statement: set @FirstTime = {first_epoch}; set @LastTime = {last_epoch}; select m.time, m.fcst_len, m.sta_id as madis_id, m.temp, m.press  as slp, m.dp, m.rh, m.wd, m.ws, m.vgtyp, c.ceil, v.vis100 as vis, m.sta_id, s.id, s.net, s.name from madis3.HRRRqp m, madis3.stations as s, ceiling2.HRRR c, visibility.HRRR v where 1 = 1 AND m.time >= @FirstTime and m.time <= @LastTime AND m.time = c.time AND m.time = v.time and m.sta_id = c.madis_id and m.sta_id = v.madis_id and m.fcst_len = c.fcst_len and m.fcst_len = v.fcst_len and m.sta_id = s.id and s.net = 'METAR' order by time, fcst_len, name;

set @FirstTime = {first_epoch}; set @LastTime = {last_epoch}; select m.time, m.fcst_len, m.sta_id as madis_id, m.temp, m.press  as slp, m.dp, m.rh, m.wd, m.ws, m.vgtyp, c.ceil, v.vis100 as vis, m.sta_id, s.id, s.net, s.name from madis3.HRRR_OPSqp m, madis3.stations as s, ceiling2.HRRR_OPS c, visibility.HRRR_OPS v where 1 = 1 AND m.time >= @FirstTime and m.time <= @LastTime AND m.time = c.time AND m.time = v.time and m.sta_id = c.madis_id and m.sta_id = v.madis_id and m.fcst_len = c.fcst_len and m.fcst_len = v.fcst_len and m.sta_id = s.id and s.net = 'METAR' order by time, fcst_len, name;

set @FirstTime = {first_epoch}; set @LastTime = {last_epoch}; select m.time, m.fcst_len, m.sta_id as madis_id, m.temp, m.press  as slp, m.dp, m.rh, m.wd, m.ws, m.vgtyp, c.ceil, m.sta_id, s.id, s.net, s.name from madis3.RAP_NCEP_fullqp m, madis3.stations as s, ceiling2.RAP_OPS c, where 1 = 1 AND m.time >= @FirstTime and m.time <= @LastTime AND m.time = c.time and m.sta_id = c.madis_id and m.fcst_len = c.fcst_len and m.sta_id = s.id and s.net = 'METAR' order by time, fcst_len, name;

set @FirstTime = {first_epoch}; set @LastTime = {last_epoch}; select m.time, m.fcst_len, m.sta_id as madis_id, m.temp, m.press  as slp, m.dp, m.rh, m.wd, m.ws, c.ceil, v.vis100 as vis, m.sta_id, s.id, s.net, s.name from madis3.RRFS_dev1qp m, madis3.stations as s, ceiling2.RRFS_dev1 c, visibility.RRFS_dev1 v where 1 = 1 AND m.time >= @FirstTime and m.time <= @LastTime AND m.time = c.time AND m.time = v.time and m.sta_id = c.madis_id and m.sta_id = v.madis_id and m.fcst_len = c.fcst_len and m.fcst_len = v.fcst_len and m.sta_id = s.id and s.net = 'METAR' order by time, fcst_len, name;
